data.title: List of the Ballon d'Or Winners
data.text:
Ballon d'Or Winner's List

The Ballon d'Or award is an annualÂ footballÂ awardÂ for the best player over the previous year. It was first awarded in 1956. The most recent winner was Argentinan Lionel Messi in 2023. Messi has won the men's Ballon d'Or award a record eight times, Cristiano Ronaldo has won the award five times.

Many visitors to this page are looking for the results of the FIFA player of the year, which was merged with the Ballon d'Or between 2010 and 2015 to create the FIFA Ballon d'Or, but is now a separate award.

Since 2018, there has also been a women's Ballon d'Or award (called the Ballon d'Or FÃ©minin).

Lionel Messi won the 2023 Ballon d'Or award for a record 8th time. Who will win in 2024?
